ps1.8:1.4: Anicce, bhikkhave, niccanti sannavipallaso cittavipallaso ditthivipallaso.
ps1.8:1.5: Dukkhe, bhikkhave, sukhanti sannavipallaso cittavipallaso ditthivipallaso.
ps1.8:1.6: Anattani, bhikkhave, attati sannavipallaso cittavipallaso ditthivipallaso.
ps1.8:1.7: Asubhe, bhikkhave, subhanti sannavipallaso cittavipallaso ditthivipallaso.
ps1.8:1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro sannavipallasa cittavipallasa ditthivipallasa.
ps1.8:2.3: Anicce, bhikkhave, aniccanti nasannavipallaso nacittavipallaso naditthivipallaso.
ps1.8:2.4: Dukkhe, bhikkhave, dukkhanti nasannavipallaso nacittavipallaso naditthivipallaso.
ps1.8:2.5: Anattani, bhikkhave, anattati nasannavipallaso nacittavipallaso naditthivipallaso.
ps1.8:2.6: Asubhe, bhikkhave, asubhanti nasannavipallaso nacittavipallaso naditthivipallaso.
ps1.8:2.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro nasannavipallasa nacittavipallasa naditthivipallasa”ti.
ps1.8:8.1: Ime cattaro vipallasa ditthisampannassa puggalassa pahina, appahinati.
ps1.8:8.3: Anicce niccanti sannavipallaso cittavipallaso ditthivipallaso pahino.
ps1.8:8.4: Dukkhe sukhanti sanna uppajjati, cittam uppajjati, ditthivipallaso pahino.
ps1.8:8.5: Anattani attati sannavipallaso cittavipallaso ditthivipallaso pahino.
ps1.8:8.6: Asubhe subhanti sanna uppajjati, cittam uppajjati, ditthivipallaso pahino.
ps1.8:8.8: Dvisu vatthusu dve vipallasa pahina, cattaro vipallasa appahina.
ps1.8:8.9: Catusu vatthusu attha vipallasa pahina, cattaro vipallasa appahinati.
